T.query: select p.productid,pv.businessentityid from product p left join productvendor pv on p.productid = pv.productid left join vendor v on pv.businessentityid = v.BusinessEntityID

F.query: select p.productid,pv.businessentityid from product p left join productvendor pv on p.productid = pv.productid join vendor v on pv.businessentityid = v.BusinessEntityID
